rationale: The segment reports a commercial case but does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Mexico, which exports just a fraction of the poultry it produces, reported its first commercial case of the season in November.

rationale: The segment reports a case using neutral language.
statement_text: Mexico, which exports just a fraction of the poultry it produces, reported its first commercial case of the season in November.
